page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE (cont.)
page.content: At 2.45 p.m. we go back indoors again and have another lesson like Welsh. Welsh is another language which Mrs. Meredith teaches us. At 3.30 p.m. it is home time. When I go home I make myself a drink of cola on the Soda Stream and I take some biscuits out of the tin. I watch television or do homework that the teacher has given me, usually Maths or English. At about 4.45 p.m. I have tea. My favourite tea is fish-fingers and chips. Sometimes I go out to play with my friends Danielle and Nicola, we play games like frisby and tennis. At 7.30 I come in again and watch television. At 8.30 p.m. mum gives me supper,a drink of coffee and some biscuits. I then go to bed and fall asleep.
